entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Moose Jaw
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Moose Jaw 12:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
